long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blocking ads hurts creators, but what if we could fast forward them instead? That's exactly what Vroom does.
When playing a video Vroom detects it and fast forwards the playback speed to over 15x and can press the skip button too if 3 seconds passes
As well as automatically dismissing banner ads, Vroom also has a toggle to skip ads as soon as the button becomes available instead of waiting for the ad to finish or 3 seconds to pass, though this is not recommended.
